about_the_game:
Are you discouraged and in search of your own destiny? We сan help you!

Are you ready to enter the arena and prove your mettle in this action-packed world?

WHERE AM I?
Welcome to Wicked Game, an immersive VR action experience designed for the most daring of players, where physics-driven brawls will push your skills to the limit. Prepare to step into an interactive arena teeming with features and a wide array of weapons, all in your quest to prove your dominance and emerge victorious.

TELL ME MORE..
Your journey begins amidst the vibrant street art of a hip-hop graffiti-covered setting. Here, you'll engage in intense combat against masked adversaries, striving to emerge as the ultimate champion.

Each location offers a unique set of game modes to test your combat prowess.
Various game modes have the unique ability to immerse players in diverse and dynamic conditions, subsequently reshaping and enriching the overall gameplay experience.

Each mode is carefully designed to bring about a distinctive set of conditions that may include altered objectives, pacing, or even the introduction of novel gameplay mechanics. This deliberate diversity ensures that players encounter a constantly evolving series of challenges and experiences as they progress through the game.

As you dive into the heart of this adrenaline-fueled game, you'll discover a total of 10 challenging levels spread across four distinct locations.

But the excitement doesn't stop there. Future updates will introduce even more thrilling modes and locations to keep you engaged.

SURPRISE ME
Run at breakneck speed, scale walls and stairs, perform breathtaking jumps to reach astonishing heights, and even parachute from rooftops to come out a winner. Ziplines are a core element of your mobility toolkit, enabling you to zip around the arena, execute combat maneuvers, and overcome obstacles with finesse. Jump platforms strategically placed within the environment will propel you to lofty vantage points, adding to the exhilaration.

WHO TO FIGHT?
Prepare for exhilarating hand-to-hand combat using various fighting techniques. Engage foes ranging from melee specialists and pistol-wielding operators to stick fighters, grenade throwers, and knife-wielding combatants. The game's physics-based world allows you to turn the environment into a weapon, leveraging it creatively to gain an advantage. Additionally, when you defeat opponents, you can snatch their weapons, adding more variety to your arsenal.

Wicked Game offers an immersive VR experience that combines stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and a wide range of challenges.

In Wicked Game, staying active is key.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DIrectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: OpenXR
